name: Rogue Planet: Reimagined Demo
description:
Rogue Planet: Reimagined

This is a not a loveless world, but a world where love is sparse, you are the exception this time around. You are Steelwyre, you must wake up, face your deepest fears, and escape this dreamy hellscape where darkness surrounds all things, even you.

Choose your destiny, and follow the path...

Discord: https://discord.gg/6QFDruM
